game_description: Vortex VR is an immersive investigation and an narrative experience : You explore the universe of the VORTEX series. Help the commissioner (played by Tomer Sisley) to solve the crime ! As a Detective, you can inspect the crime scene: hurry up! You'll only have 20 minutes to collect all the clues and solve the crime before the tide covers the evidence. Features: - Controlling time - Exploring and manipulating clues - Interactive narration - Actor Tomer Sisley in motion capture Only available in French
review_1: I like the concept and visual search for clues. Wish it was in english.
